code: import*as axios from"axios";export var shopAPI={getStore:function getStore(){return axios.get("/games").then(function(response){return response.data;});},getStatus:function getStatus(){return axios.get("/store/status");},changeStatus:function changeStatus(status){return axios.post("/store/status",{status:status});}};export var libraryAPI={addToLibrary:function addToLibrary(gameId){return axios.post("/game/addtolibrary",{gameId:gameId});},removeFromLibrary:function removeFromLibrary(gameId){return axios.post("/game/removefromlibrary",{gameId:gameId});},downloadGame:function downloadGame(gameId){return axios.post("/game/download",{gameId:gameId});},deleteGame:function deleteGame(gameId){return axios.post("/game/delete",{gameId:gameId});},getView:function getView(){return axios.get("/library/view");},changeView:function changeView(text){return axios.put("/library/view",{text:text});}};export var wishlistAPI={addToWishlist:function addToWishlist(gameId){return axios.post("/game/addtowishlist",{gameId:gameId});},removeFromWishlist:function removeFromWishlist(gameId){return axios.post("/game/removefromwishlist",{gameId:gameId});}};export var languageAPI={getLanguage:function getLanguage(){return axios.get("/language");},changeLanguage:function changeLanguage(language){return axios.post("/language",{language:language});}};
